name: Open Driving 3D
body:
# Welcome!

Open-Driving-3D is a driving simulator that I'm making in python with panda3d. I plan to at some point add AI traffic. Its still in early development, which means that its still pretty basic.

The reason I wanted to create a driving sim was because there don't seem to be enough free ones.

You need the Panda3d game engine to run this program, because currently there are no binaries, just the source.


## Features

* A car that you can drive around.
* Three different ground textures to choose from.
* You can change the time.
* Interior with working steering wheel.


## Screenshots

![Menu and car.](http://s27.postimg.org/3la3kkiyb/Screenshot_Sun_Jun_28_14_54_47_2015_421.jpg)
![Inside of car.](http://s15.postimg.org/54zec0hnf/Screenshot_Sun_Jun_28_14_55_13_2015_1975.jpg)
![Car parked.](http://s8.postimg.org/xrdd9t2hh/Screenshot_Sun_Jun_28_14_55_46_2015_3985.jpg)


## Controls

Accelerate = Up Arrow

Turn Left = Left Arrow

Turn Right = Right Arrow

Brake = Down arrow

Change View = 1, 2, 3

Change gear = page up, page down

Turn the car on and off = x

Parking brake = p

Reset car = backspace

Hooter(Horn) = enter

Menu = escape
